before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"39dnt","text":"Longmire’s buffer preparation: ensure that Longmire's buffer is prepared using PCR grade water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"c0j03","text":"This method presents an optimized protocol for the automated extraction of environmental DNA (eDNA) from estuarine samples using magnetic beads. The addition of Proteinase K to the lysis solution facilitates DNA solubilization at 56°C and mechanical rotation ensures thorough lysis. The DNA is then purified using a double ethanol wash and magnetic bead-based extraction on a KingFisher system. The method is designed for filters preserved in Longmire's buffer.  If a different preservation is used the first step should be modified.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"6ir09","text":"Follow Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) procedures.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"57epe","text":"Clean workspace:  Thoroughly clean all work surfaces including the benchtop and equipment exteriors using a 5%-10% bleach solution followed by a distilled water rinse. Wipe down pipettes, pipette tip boxes, sharpies, pens and any other tools that will be used during the protocol to avoid cross contamination.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9j9ep","text":"Incubator check: Verify that the incubator is operational and set to the correct temperature before use (56°C ).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fvter","text":"Handling: Use aseptic techniques to avoid introducing contaminants into sample preparations. Include extraction blanks to check for cross contamination from adjacent wells.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"55fg2","text":"Storage: If immediate DNA extraction is not possible, samples can be stored in Longmire's buffer at room temperature for up to 50 days (minimize exposure to light), or frozen at -20°C or -80°C for long-term storage.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1t110","text":"Notes","type":"header-four","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"lpo4","text":"Illumina Tune beads (CAT: 20060057) performed better than Ampure XP and are cheaper.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: eDNA,Environmental DNA,Automation,PCR inhibitor removal,DNA extraction,Magnetic beads,Environmental biomonitoring,Automated extraction,Zymo clean up,KingFisher instrument
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"88jiv","text":"Protective gear","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cf1va","text":"Gloves: to eliminate/reduce contamination when handling samples","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9p291","text":"Lab coat","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bhsvp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"85cmm","text":"Cleaning supplies","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ejuc0","text":"5%-10% bleach solution: for cleaning benches and equipment","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"531cj","text":"Distilled water: for rinsing","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6qlel","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a7c3v","text":"Consumables","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cl9sp","text":"Deep Well Plates (DWP) (97002540)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"55fgc","text":"200 µl plates: for elution (97002540)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9n0ge","text":"Tip comb for DW magnets (97002534)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b8p8c","text":"Pipettes and pipette tips: 1,000 μl, 200 μl, 20 μl","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dn2m1","text":"Reagent troughs/reservoirs","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3lp58","text":"Tape: for securing during incubation","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"arnm6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ld1b","text":"Reagents","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4v47l","text":"Longmire’s buffer (see References): prepare using the following components to make a total of 500 mL:","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":10}],"data":{}},{"key":"1c7r2","text":"     -50 mL of 1 M Tris-HCl, pH 8.0 (for buffering the solution)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4u9uo","text":"     -100 mL of 0.5 M EDTA, pH 8.0 (chelates divalent cations and prevents degradation by nucleases)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6v2i4","text":"     -1 mL of 5 M NaCl (provides ionic strength to the buffer)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ddml","text":"     -12.5 mL of 20% SDS (w/v) (a detergent that aids in cell lysis and protein solubilizing)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bc8pg","text":"     -336.5 mL of PCR grade water (used to bring the solution up to the final volume and ensure purity)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epbd1","text":"Proteinase K: from Promega (CAT: PRMC5005)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8sco0","text":"80% ethanol: used for wash steps","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f2a5s","text":"Tris-HCl (10 mM): used in the elution plate","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"64j74","text":"Illumina Tune Beads (CAT: 20060057): for magnetic bead based DNA extraction","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"396gq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4h43i","text":"Equipment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7udta","text":"Incubator with a rotator: set at 56°C for incubation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4a81m","text":"Multichannel pipette (i.e. Integra): for efficient handling of multiple samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4920p","text":"Kingfisher Flex Purification System","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"635qh","text":"Qubit reagents or HTS Microplate Reader: for quantifying DNA concentration","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2rq53","text":"Nanodrop analyzer: for assessing DNA quality (optional)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e1qn7","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"AEC3F6A8B8AC4E29B0140CF5B3D7A279","url":"https://www.protocols.io/edit/automated-edna-extraction-from-estuarine-samples-u-ddj424qw/references"}}}}
protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"esvsu","text":"Sanches, T.M. and Schreier, A.D., 2020. Optimizing an eDNA protocol for estuarine environments: Balancing sensitivity, cost and time. PLoS One, 15(5), p.e0233522.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":134,"length":8},{"style":"italic","offset":144,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ckb0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cth2","text":"Longmire, J.L., Maltbie, M. and Baker, R.J., 1997. Use of\" lysis buffer\" in DNA isolation and its implication for museum collections.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"apmb1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c1j6a","text":"Perform the following steps in a biosafety cabinet under aseptic conditions","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4k7fi","text":"For samples collected on filters stored in Longmire's buffer (wet filters)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":74}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3fhau","text":"Pipette out all of the Longmire's buffer from the sample tube into a separate Eppendorf tube (leave the sample filter in the sample tube)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ca1r2","text":"Pipette 490 μl per filter of the original Longmire's buffer back into the sample tube","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":15,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6gesa","text":"Add 10 μl of Proteinase K per filter into the sample tube (total volume 500 μl)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":26,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"718dk","text":"Using the pipette tip, mix the reagents thoroughly","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"823ok","text":"Using the same pipette tip, ensure the filter(s) are completely submerged in the Longmire's buffer/Proteinase K solution","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8m2ki","text":" For dry filters, add 1000 μl of Longmire's solution to the tube, ensuring the filter is completely    submerged - Incubate for 90 min to overnight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":148}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eprgq","text":"Pipette out all of the Longmire's buffer from the sample tube into a separate Eppendorf tube (leave the sample filter in the sample tube)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5qi8i","text":"Pipette 490 μl per filter of the original Longmire's buffer back into the sample tube","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":15,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"at75h","text":"Add 10 μl of Proteinase K per filter into the sample tube (total volume 500 μl)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":26,"length":4},{"style":"italic","offset":36,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"181bh","text":"Using the pipette tip, mix the reagents thoroughly","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8c956","text":"Using the same pipette tip, ensure the filter(s) are completely submerged in the Longmire's buffer/Proteinase K solution","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e3vuv","text":"After the program ends, immediately proceed with the Zymo cleanup steps using the elution plate, or store the plate at -20°C for future use. Dispose of chemical reagents according to Lab Hazardous Waste Management Plan.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"egeg0","text":"Place tubes in tube rack on a rotating or gently shaking surface in a 56°C incubator","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"q4i0","text":"Secure rack with tape","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qlvp","text":"Turn on rotator","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"do18k","text":"Incubate for 90 minutes or overnight","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6qlpo","text":"After incubation proceed with steps below. Alternatively samples can be kept at 4°C overnight for a later extraction.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"349oi","text":"After incubation, transfer 400 μl of the supernatant lysis to a new DWP (this is the sample plate). Bubble formation sometimes occurs due to the presence of SDS. Ensure the tubes are tightly sealed to prevent evaporation during the 56°C incubation period","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bo7ti","text":"Add 320 μl of Illumina Tune beads to the sample plate wells (1:8 sample to beads ratio to remove small DNA fragments \u003c 200bp)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fcebe","text":"Washing and Elution Plates Preparation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":38}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqeqd","text":"During the 90 minute incubation step, prepare two wash plates by pipetting 500 μl freshly prepared 80% ethanol into the wells of two DWPs","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6k882","text":"Prepare an elution plate by pipetting 100 μL of 10 mM Tris-HCl into the wells of a 200 μl plate","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5t2ct","text":"Place the sample plate (containing the 720 μl of sample + beads), wash plates 1 and 2 and the elution plate into the KingFisher and run the program as follows","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93dar","text":"The KingFisher is optimized for the volumes stated in this protocol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4u0cn","text":"KingFisher Program","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rpfs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ebgkm","text":"1. Pick up:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"66aj3","text":"   Tip comb plate","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"enus1","text":"2. Binding:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a33dl","text":"   Mix for 5 minutes at medium speed","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"r616","text":"   Collect beads, count: 5","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ba0b9","text":"   Move to sample plate","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fn38a","text":"3. 1st Wash:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8tjqi","text":"   Release beads","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajge5","text":"   Bottom mix and medium speed, each for 10 seconds, loop count 2","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ilq1","text":"   Collect beads, count: 3; collect time: 5 seconds","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d3j43","text":"   Transfer to wash plate 1","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6upo1","text":"4. 2nd Wash:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"136kl","text":"   Release beads for 20 seconds","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1leio","text":"   Bottom mix and medium speed, each for 10 seconds, loop count 2","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cn0tf","text":"   Collect beads, count: 4; collect time: 5 seconds","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ctj91","text":"   Transfer to wash plate 2","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95hle","text":"5. Dry:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cg329","text":"   Use wash plate 2","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1bnnr","text":"6. Elution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"blj99","text":"   Preheat to 60°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3mkj2","text":"   Bottom mix for 15 seconds, medium speed for 45 seconds, loop count: 6","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"edgli","text":"   Collect beads, count: 1","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5krs6","text":"   Transfer to elution plate","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eb684","text":"7. Collection of Beads:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1f7fn","text":"   2 minutes at slow speed","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Automated eDNA Extraction from Estuarine Samples Using Magnetic Beads

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"4feok","text":"Ensure all surfaces and equipment are thoroughly cleaned with 5%-10% bleach and rinsed with distilled water to prevent contamination. Include extraction blanks to check for sample cross contamination.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
